summary: Implement mobile (<=767px) sidebar drawer behavior: starts closed, opens via hamburger, auto-closes immediately on menu selection and on outside-tap via backdrop; keep desktop (>=768px) persistent sidebar behavior unchanged.
architectural_notes: Use Tailwind 'md' (768px) breakpoint: <md treat sidebar as temporary drawer/overlay (default closed), >=md keep persistent sidebar.
On mobile, close sidebar immediately on menu link click by resetting existing open/closed state; also close on backdrop/outside click.
known_issues: On mobile, sidebar remains open after navigation and overlays main content (videos/filters/search), blocking interaction.

existing_features.title: Update the mobile sidebar drawer behavior (below Tailwind `md` / <=767px) so the drawer closes immediately when any sidebar menu item is clicked, without waiting for route navigation to finish, and the main content becomes fully visible and interactive (no overlap).

Ensure the mobile drawer cannot block taps or scrolling after it has been closed (e.g., prevent the off-canvas drawer element from capturing pointer events when closed, and/or only render the drawer/backdrop when open).
Add/verify a semi-transparent backdrop for the mobile drawer (below `md`) that appears only when the drawer is open and closes the drawer when the user taps outside the sidebar area.

Keep existing UI/UX and features unchanged aside from the mobile drawer fix: preserve dark theme styling, icons, existing navigation labels/paths (including the Life Lessons path), and existing page functionality (video list, filters, search, etc.).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix mobile sidebar overlay: auto-close drawer on any menu item click (immediate), show hamburger again, add backdrop tap-to-close; keep desktop persistent sidebar unchanged (Tailwind md breakpoint).

projectName: Fix mobile sidebar drawer to auto-close instantly on menu selection (md breakpoint)
